Package game.environment

Class CapableGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
game.environment.CapableGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, GroundInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bush, Tree, VendingMachine
public abstract class CapableGround extends Ground
A class to add all the necessary capabilities to different terrain.
